CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . Mr PERSON , a teacher who works in CARDINAL secondary schools in GPE , lives in GPE di GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE he applied to ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) for judicial review of CARDINAL reductions in salary , for DATE and DATE , imposed on him by the ORG inspectorate and reimbursement of the sums unpaid , after adjustment for inflation and the addition of interest at the statutory rate .
CARDINAL . On DATE he asked for a date to be fixed for the hearing . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE he applied for the case to be set down for an urgent hearing .
CARDINAL . According to the information supplied by the applicant , on DATE , the proceedings were then still pending .
